snippet: Senator Bernie Sanders is airing the first television ad of his campaign, a biographical spot that describes his up-by-the-bootstraps childhood in Brooklyn, incorporates imagery of the late Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and paints him as “an honest...
abstract: Senator Bernie Sanders is airing the first television ad of his campaign, a biographical spot that describes his up-by-the-bootstraps childhood in Brooklyn, incorporates imagery of the late Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and paints him as “an honest leader.”

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Is Airing His First Ad of the Campaign
